about_the_game:
Discover the Serenity of Japanese Culture with Ying, the Gracious Geisha

Embark on a Tranquil Journey to Japan with Ying

Experience the elegance and beauty of Japanese culture with Ying, a graceful girl who loves traditions like tea ceremonies and calligraphy. This captivating content invites you to explore a world of tranquility, art, and ancient customs as you connect with this serene and creative character.

About Ying:

  • Serene Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with tranquility, from peaceful tea ceremonies to serene walks in traditional gardens.

  • Shared Passions: Discover Ying's love for Japanese culture, art, and traditional crafts, and share your own passions with her.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build a strong emotional connection with Ying.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring Ying's world to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Japanese culture

  • Art and history

Don't miss your chance to experience the tranquility of Ying's story. Purchase the DLC today and start your own serene love affair!

Ying is a graceful Japanese girl who loves traditions like tea ceremonies and calligraphy. She radiates calm creativity.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
